website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a good deal on wooden spoons that you can use for a variety of cooking purposes, this set of three is hard to beat in terms of value.
pros: This set of beech wood spoons offers 3 sizes for an affordable price
Large holes on the handles make it easy to hang them for storage
cons: They have the tendency to dry out

customer_reviews.title: Quality, classy, look great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these spoons after seeing them as part of a display at the Container Store and LOVE them. This is odd to say about a wooden spoon, but these are quality, have a great thick handle that feels good in your hand, have a deep indent on the head, and look great. In traditional Oxo fashion, they feel like a high-end kitchen utensil should. I read other reviews about cracking and splitting, but I simply treated mine with a light amount of mineral oil and they look better and will hold up even better. I rate a perfect 5/5 and would definitely purchase again!!! Thank you for reading and rating my review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SteveTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are awful. I can’t use them. They are not sealed. They are dry and splinter
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Nice while they last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted good spoons for my enamelware, and they did the trick for a few weeks. I understand these are not finished, so I made sure to handwash every use, promptly dry and apply mineral oil so they wouldn't dry out. Alas, this did no good and the largest spoon has developed cracks in 3 places on the tip of the soon that are slowly making it downward. I'll keep using the smaller ones till they fail too, but I'll be getting another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent BUT be sure to oil them beforw the first use with coconut oil or olive oil or lard as you would a wood cutting board. They last longer and won't dry out or crack if you do that!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not up to snuff - why do i have treat $4 items?
customer_reviews.text: I am just not sure where all these positive reviews are coming from. OXO is a well known kitchenware brand, but these wooden items simply dont cut it. I had no idea i was supposed to treat a $4 wooden spatula with oil before and after using, that is pretty ridiculous. The picture is from only a couple uses of the wooden spatula, wheres the slotted one has not been used. cracks, rough wood, and just generally looks like its been through a garbage disposal. would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Corey R

customer_reviews.title: Soooo very disappointed! I got them last Thursday used them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo very disappointed! I got them last Thursday used them and wash them once yes! Only one time and they are ready to be thrown away! Waste of money. I usually like oxo items NOT this ones. Check the pics.
customer_reviews.author: mja

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a rough finish.
customer_reviews.text: I was frankly disappointed. I am used to Oxo products being excellent. These spoons seem sturdy enough, but the finish On these is quite rough, to the point where it feels as though you could get a splinter from them (no, I did not find any splinters on them, but still...). I have had much less expensive wooden spoons with a finer and smoother finish than these. I have been putting some oil on them after using them, but it really hasn’t made a difference. This may be a question of my expectations being too high.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted
customer_reviews.text: I usually like OXO products, but this is quite disappointing. These spoons are rough, unpolished, and I haven’t removed them from the wrapper for the fear of splinters. The package says “oiled”, but they don’t appear to be so. Will likely send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Eniv

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome addition to any kitchen! My dad is a master chef and insists that I always have a wooden spoon on hand should he come and visit. However, the ones I've had in the past were so flat they were practically useless for anything besides stirring. What I love about these spoons is they are curved just enough to be useful as a scoop or server as well as a stirrer. It is also nice to have a variety of sizes. I would definitely buy these again if/when they eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Oxo wooden spoons-- Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot. I love these spoons! Great to hold , comfortable, easier for seniors ( thicker handle and not slippery). And best of all they get all those places in the pot you're stirring. Wash them when you're finished and don't leave them soaking in water. The little spoon is great for stirring sauces, custards or oatmeal. I bought four more sets for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: happy in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as part if the prize for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place winners in a chili cook-off. They looked really nice tied up with the fancy ribbons and dish towels. My husband won so I can personally say that they are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in less than a month of low usage
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. One of the spoons already cracked (less than a month) and the only thing I use it for is stirring my coffee in my glass French press. Always handwash too.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs improving
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and the perfect size. However, the reason these got a 3 star is that they are a bit difficult to clean. They are really "woody" so trying to get some raw meat off of the spoons proves to be a bit difficult. Not impossible, but I don't love how you can feel the wood. I wish these had a protective coating (non-toxic) of some sort. I used to have wooden spoon that was really smooth and super sturdy. Wish these were smoother...
customer_reviews.author: Sportzmaster87

customer_reviews.title: Rough
customer_reviews.text: Rough and uneven surface! Worried about getting splinters. Will not use.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Rogh finish but good assortment
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are a good assortment and it is great that there is a big spoon for sauces etc.... my complaint is that the finish on the spoons is very rough. They are not comfortable to hold in your hand when cooking. I have many other wooden spoons and they all are nice and smooth... not sure why these are so rough. I don't use them much because of the finish.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Nice spoons but I was sent a defective product. The hole in the wood goes all the way through the spoon and someone thought it would be a good idea to fill it and call it good.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Didn't think I would use the little one, but i used it 1st. I really like them & plan on throwing my really old beat up cheap ones out. I just hope beech wood holds up as good as bamboo. They are a little rough, but they're suppose to be, they're real wood. And they don't smell either. I always hand wash my wooden spoons. I would never put them in a dishwasher. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dee L.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Heft
customer_reviews.text: I love these well made and somewhat hefty wooden spoons. They are just what I wanted to add to my collection of wooden utensils and spurtles for my instant pots. I also bought the square edge spoon to match the set. The quality of these spoons exceeded my expectations. I can not speak to the spatula set but the spoons are perfect. They are thick, hefty and beautifully made. I use Boos Mystery Oil to treat these and my wooden spurtles from Debbie Doos. Very happy with this purchase and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT SOAK OVER NIGHT MY SPOON CRACKED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: WORD OF WARNING.! My Husband left one of the spoons soaking in water all night and it craked the spoon. I couldnt believe it. These are quality spoons. They're thick and sturdy. You can use them for mixing anything. Some flimsy spoons break when mixing certain things. These will hold up, they are very sturdy. I'm very pleased with these spoons. And they're attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Debra55

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, 5 stars. Overall, just 4 stars, primarily because the spoons are dry and need to be oiled, but also because the finish is a little rough. They are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They feel like a dried popsicle stick
customer_reviews.text: I loved these spoons when they arrived because they had a smooth satiny finish. Unfortunately, after running these through the dishwasher once, they came out feeling like dry, splintered popsicle sticks. It actually feels like you're going to get a splinter. Makes me cringe every time I have to touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer Trice

customer_reviews.title: Splinters
customer_reviews.text: The shapes are fine and exactly what I was looking for. However, they are not finished so it feels like I’m going to get a splinter every time I use them. Kind of a shame. Do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: The spoons work
customer_reviews.text: The spoons work well for stirring liquids and stirring sautéing foods. The wood does absorb some of the colors from the sauces and as I do put them in the dishwasher, they do dry out a little. I prefer Olive Wood spoons but these do the job.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after one use and hand washing. I hopefully can get a replacement set sent without have to ship the back as it’s not worth the hassle. It’s too bad because they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very rough to touch, cracked after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after 3 uses- had been hand washed only. I’m not too sad about it though because it was very rough to the touch, to the point that I’m not sure it could be considered food safe (you can see the rough quality on the edge in the photo). I’ve always been a fan of Oxo but this is making me reconsider, it’s just that bad.
customer_reviews.author: mauden

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: A good set of wood spoons for a reasonable price. In some ways I like the dense surface of olive wood better but not sure I want to pay for that. These are just fine and this set of three covers most uses. Don't forget to put mineral oil on them and wash/dry them by hand. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Sourdough starter users
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wood spoons to stir and use with sourdough starters. The slim design allows you to stir the starter in a regular size lid, mason jar. That's perfect. Sturdy enough to handle turning flour into dough and easy to clean. I suggest hand wash, because they are wood. Like having 3 sizes in one package also.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons. Not a smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice spoons. The only thing I didn’t like was they are a little rough. They don’t have a real smooth finish. They do however have a really nice bowl shaped spoon. You can actually serve something with them. A lot of wooden spoons are too flat. If you’re not picky about the feel of unfinished wood, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Melina Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Love how thick these are! I had an old wooden spoon I used on some recipes but it turned and cracked in the dishwasher. Got a pack of 5 from Marshall’s to hold me over and they were cheap. Even got a splinter from those. These however are great! They are smooth, great color and really nice to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Morales

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy.  Like them more every time I use them.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy wooden spoons with thick handles! That's what I'm talking about. Though, I'm glad they didn't make them like this when I was a kid... I’ve actually ordered another set. I prefer them to my others, and needed more between wash loads.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: WTF? Rough and splintery all over! I had to sand it down myself to make them usable.
customer_reviews.author: enzo

customer_reviews.title: Must oil after each use
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific spoons. The only drawback is they get dry and need oiling after each use. I use a beeswax compound to keep them moist and that works great. But as soon as they are used and washed, they must be re-oiled again, they lose their moisture quickly. Other than that, I love the spoons.
customer_reviews.author: The Baroque Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have pointed out, these wooden utensils need to be sanded. The product photo is very misleading, because they are not smooth at all. It's unfortunate, because now i have to go out and buy sandpaper (the mineral oil i used did not make a difference to the texture), before i can use them any further.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Cofrancesco

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I couldn't be happier. I have been trying to switch all of our cookware to healthier options. I read a ton of reviews on wooden cookware and most said they were terribly quality and had splinters, chunks missing or a suspicious coating on them. These had none of the above and are wonderful. Exactly what I was looking for! I would absolutely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Dallis Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Different Shape Has Grown On Me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wasn't sure I'd like these. I've always had those little flat, round wooden spoons, but these have a much deeper scoop and a hefty, thick handle. But I've started using them for everything. I have a flat spatula thingy too, and between them, that's all I use anymore. I wondered if I should oil them, like the other reviewer said, but, being lazy, I didn't, and they're doing fine. I've used them in tomato sauce, cranberry sauce, and curry, and they haven't retained weird color or smell in the wood after washing. Also, they make a more substantial-looking weapon when holiday guests look like they're going to try to take over my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Innes

customer_reviews.title: Needed a little sanding.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sizes. They weren't sanded very smooth. But after a few minutes sanding with 400 grit and coating with mineral oil they are nice and smooth. I also used a belt sander to reduce the size of the largest handle. It was too thick for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chief54

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Loved the different sizes. Didn’t care for how quickly they split. Never been in the dishwasher. Wash them like all my other wooden spoons and these are the only ones that split within the first month of having them. Wish I could return. Garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice well-built thick spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well-built thick spoons. You'd have to misuse it to break it. The small one can be used as a larger tablespoon that doubles as personal small campfire cooking spoon. The middle is long enough as a good camping fire cooking spoon but if you need longer the large one is a great long cooking spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are not all made out of the same wood... I washed them and oiled them... The large spoon is fine... The middle size spoon cracked and split very badly the first time I used it.... DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Barry

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Looked great but type of wood they used is not smooth and flakes off, so you can see the little flakes attached to spatulas. I expected to be better quality wood. I put wood oil on it but does not help.
customer_reviews.author: snapbackcollector

customer_reviews.title: Stain easily
customer_reviews.text: They stain easily. Stained with spaghetti sauce and I’m afraid I’ll get splinters with these cause they feel rough. Not smooth wood. I should’ve bought the wooden spoons with silicone .
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maria Flores

customer_reviews.title: Already started to crack - Not a smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my pampered Chef wooden pieces these don't even come close. The finish is rough and they have already started to crack. With cracks on the ends I can't rely on this to be sanatary.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after FIRST use
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this. Bought b/c of good reviews and brand name. Stirred beans with the medium size spoon. Let sit and washed after dinner. Noticed it was cracked at the end of the night after drying.
customer_reviews.author: Rehabguy

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of utensils.
customer_reviews.text: This wood combo makes it possible for me to cook using my cast iron, non-stick and stainless steel pans. Not often you can get something that works well in all 3 type of pans. I highly recommend this combo for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: T. Malley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: I got these spoons last year and I really like them. They do the job that was intended, but there is one draw back, especially for our son. You have to clean these by hand. They do not go into the dishwasher. They are a great product and you can tell that they are very sturdy, nothing like the cheapy wooden spoons you get at walmart, which haven't lasted me lately, that's why I purchased these. It's been a year and they have lasted with out showing any signs of breaking or spiintering.
customer_reviews.author: Danni Irene

customer_reviews.title: OXO 1130780 Good Grips Wooden Spoon Set, 3-Piece,Brown
customer_reviews.text: Work well and good price. Do need to season with food grade mineral oil every so often to keep the wood from drying out and splitting, also be careful not to soak in dishwater.
customer_reviews.author: NancyW

customer_reviews.title: So glad I gave these a try
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I gave these a try. I've always liked to use wooden spoons for cooking/baking but the ones I had weren't quite working for me. I guess the "bowl" part of the spoon wasn't deep enough to suit me. These OXO Good Grips spoons are perfect. I have used all three sizes now and find all of them useful. In addition, they are comfortable in my hand. After washing, I've been using the special odorless/tasteless/colorless mineral oil to protect them and they look great. I found the price to be very reasonable and I couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: Really Excellent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy high quality wood tools. I was very impressed with the quality of the wood and the build. I highly recommend these for any chef---amateur or a pro!
customer_reviews.author: Pilot, hunter and fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmenship!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, thick, & rigid as oak, yet light as balsa wood... My favorite is the sauteuse paddle, it's untouchable & sets a precedent! Highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wooden Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I have used the two larger of these a bit and they are just the right handle size for me, that is, not too small. Very sturdy and dense wood making them easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bobart

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I cook with these utensils: scramble eggs, flip French toast, stir sautéed veggies, mix rice, rotate meatballs, mix dough, make stew,
customer_reviews.author: PAN

customer_reviews.title: Thick utensils
customer_reviews.text: Very thick. I have had no problems with splintering. They are too thick for turning food but perfect for my purpose of stirring in nonstick pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lissdwn33

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The largest spoon has a huge crack in it. We hand wash these. I’m very disappointed because this was a gift for my husband. We’ve had these less than a month. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these spoons! Not even sure why I own anything else to be honest. Definitely buy a natural oil at the same time to make sure they don’t get ruined. hot foods will make them wear more quickly than if you are using them for just dough or tossing dressings and sauces and they are sturdy enough they will last a long long time with proper care.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer29109

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved all three! But they are deep and I wanted shallow, but I still use them a lot! Now I want the shallows of the same quality! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yhanne Brode

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons are good but can be better. Wood quality is slightly not as expected. It looks like it can break easily if some force is exerted. But serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pritesh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I received the product yesterday. I haven't it even once and the big spatula already has a crack in it. The texture of the spatulas is so rough, it feels like sandpaper. I don't think I can use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Kher

customer_reviews.title: I put them in the garbage where they belong
customer_reviews.text: I took the big spoon out of package. I washed it. Then used it to scrape the bottom of my stew pan and a big chunk broke off. I put them in the garbage where they belong.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Strange texture. I haven't had for long but not as smooth and comfortavle as all the reviews would have suggested. Just ok for me but notthng wrong either.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Good value, attractive, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are still new, so I can’t truly speak to durability. Good, solid wooden spoons; attractive enough to use as servers, yet purchased for cooking implements. Wanted the flat sides (to fit into coconut oil jars), and am happy with the 3 sizes and value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: TBH22

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basic wooden spoon set and came across this one. The finish on the wood is rough - I feel like I could get a sliver from handling these (haven't yet...). The smallest spoon is useless for me when cooking because it's so short I'd burn my hand reaching into a pan. However, the small spoon might be good for serving out of a bowl. They seem high quality, like they won't snap upon use. I've had them about 8 months and haven't had any problems yet. I do have to hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Waited too long to buy these as I didn't want ...
customer_reviews.text: Waited too long to buy these as I didn't want to grasp the fact I'm getting older and arthritis is setting in. After I came to grips with the obvious, I searched for utensils that would aid with cooking. These definitely have larger handles and are holding up very well. Now I have absolutely no excuse for not cooking. I am going to lightly sand them soon and condition with mineral oil.
customer_reviews.author: CincySaab95

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I'd hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: My sister who cooks a lot had told me that wooden spoons are a necessity in the kitchen. I bought these spoons about 6 weeks ago, and they've been great. Durable, lightweight, and sturdy. Just make sure to wash them by hand as they're not made to be cleaned in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Laura O. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Already cracking/splitting at the tip
customer_reviews.text: I am using these set of wooden spoons for about 10 days now. The biggest one is already cracking at the tip, as you can see in the photo. Don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it, so maybe I will keep on using it until it breaks apart, which maybe soon. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy these spoons are. Real wood, and still lightweight. Nice and deep, great for spooning out gravies and curries, and also for nonstick cookware. Prefer these to silicon anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Alan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: love the heft of these spoons. Much better than the cheap wooden ones that snap off when you mix something stiff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: unique
customer_reviews.text: i've never seem wooden spoons like these. the scoop is quite deep which makes them good for serving as well as cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much!! They are strong and sturdy! OXO brand are the only utensils i buy. They last and are fantastic products for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Malone

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Oxo always makes such great products. I have never bought something from them that I wasn't happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: You really cannot go wrong by purchasing OXO Good Grips products and this 3 piece wooden spoon set is no exception. Unlike the cheaply made wooden spoons you find hanging here and there in grocery stores which split and become furry easily and just don't last, these are made to last while not costing an arm and a leg to purchase. Their handles are bigger around which feel better in my hands too while the cheaper ones have really skinny handles and are uncomfortable to me. I'm expecting to use these spoons for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jewvonne

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Thick and sturdy. Far from the cheap wood ladles you get in the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Much thicker than pictures suggest, impedes use.
customer_reviews.text: Much thicker than pictures suggest. No edge to get under what you're cooking. Difficult to even scramble eggs with.
customer_reviews.author: homeslave

customer_reviews.title: Works great with nonstick and stainless
customer_reviews.text: Glad I upgraded my cheaper spoons. They're bigger and deeper. Kept the cheap ones for mixing Kool aid and these are my go to for stove top cooking
customer_reviews.author: Someone from somewhere

customer_reviews.title: I like these very much - after I used a sander on them
customer_reviews.text: I use these to cook in coated pans. As shipped, they were too thick for me to easily use. But I hit each of them with a belt sander to sand away a wedge on the bottom and give them a reasonably sharp front edge, and they worked very well. They are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Michener

customer_reviews.title: Work great, just don't wash them in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I finally did a little research on why my wooden spoons keep getting cracks a few months after buying them, I discovered you're not supposed to put them in the dishwasher. I've been washing these by hand, and they are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: The hanging holes are nice.
customer_reviews.text: One spoon is so small, I may find a use for it, but it was surprising how small it was. The large spoon was the one I really wanted. It seemed as though it needed a little more sanding though (a bit rough). The hanging holes are nice.
customer_reviews.author: allegro

customer_reviews.title: Weird color
customer_reviews.text: The look nice and sturdy, but they are a bit red in color, such which I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Spatula cracked within a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: One of the spatulas cracked after a couple week of use. I forgot to return it and now I'm stuck with it. Definitely better quality products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Ok spoons
customer_reviews.text: Lighter in color than I was expecting and they don’t really have a protective seal covering the wood We still use them
customer_reviews.author: Jswife4life

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I would expect
customer_reviews.text: They feel great and work well, but after about 1-2 months of normal use, a crack has developed down the middle of the broad turner. I only handwash them and don't remember dropping them so am inclined to think that this was from just normal use and going from a wet to dry state? Overall like them, but its durability makes me less inclined to give this a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Q88Q

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are very rough. It cracked after first use. Not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These have become my go-to utensils for stirring everything while cooking because they feel so solid and comfortable in the hand. They are very easy to clean by hand and look nice on the countertop in a nice white crock.
customer_reviews.author: EFS

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were longer, but other than that they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kresha Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Splitting
customer_reviews.text: Two out of three of them are splitting so it’s really not durable
customer_reviews.author: mihwa jo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wooden spoons
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons are quite sturdy, nice looking and easy to grip and hold. They appear to be very good quality, and do not seem prone to warping or chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Goldilocks Porridge
customer_reviews.text: Comes in 3 convenient sizes, perfect to reenact the famous Goldilocks fable, 3 Porridge spoons - One for Papa - Too Hot!!! One for Mama - Too Cold!!! One for Baby Bear - Just right!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The leading edge isn't right, it's symmetrically beveled from an overthick 'spatula'
customer_reviews.text: A belt sander could make these usable.; re-sand the edge to make it an inclined plane.
customer_reviews.author: A. New

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are sturdy and easy to clean. Excellent set to cook with!
customer_reviews.author: Imabanana

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: These wooden spoons are very sturdy. They have a little more "spoon" depth then I like. What I liked the least is the wood has a rough feeling Other wooden spoons are smoother. These ones feel like they would not clean and seem porous. I almost feel like i would get a splinter.
customer_reviews.author: Carmar

customer_reviews.title: Good for the home cook enthusiast,
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend that you oil these spoons as you would a cutting board before use so that the moisture doesn't cause cracking and splliting of the spoons. I love to use these when I make candies. I also use them for salads cooking soups etc. Would recommend to the home cook who likes to make things from "scratch". I've used to hand mix cake batters, and the potential uses are limitless.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon set
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for spoons...These are the ones to buy! They are good for mixing sauces, batter, soups, and so on. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Newman

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons don't last 6 months. I bought them last may and they are cracked already
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog chewed up one of my wooden spoons and I bought these and LOVE them. They are a good weight, wash well and are very comfortable to use. Very good product. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: bowqueen4sam

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set of tools for your kitchen. Don't hesitate to buy from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: titospna

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the nicest spoons I’ve owned. They are comparable to some of the better all of wood I have bought. Great value great quality. Only concern is how easily they will steam with things like turmeric as they’re not coated in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Jessee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month or so. Today I noticed a large c ack in the tip of the largest spoon. These have been properly maintained and certainly not abused yet they have already broken down. Lesson learned. Different manufacturer next time.
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Buy Now!! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about the OXO Good Grips Wooden spoons! The quality of these spoons is amazing. They are very smooth to the touch and extremely easy to wash. I have had no staining of the wood even when I've used while mixing foods with tomatoes, marinara sauce or turmeric. Even leaving one of the wooden spoons in a chicken stew filled with turmeric for an hour for periodic stirring didn't cause a stain after washing!
customer_reviews.author: Mememe

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’m not a huge fan of wooden spoons but these have more of a flat bottom making it easier to scrape the bottom of a pot without damaging it. Has a good ‘scoop’ to it. I oiled with coconut oil before the first use and occasionally when they look dry and they have held up beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Floyd

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for high quality wooden cooking instruments. I've bought and tried a few other wooden cooking spoons and turners - and ended up throwing them away because they were poor quality, gave me splinters, and didn't hold up well. When they arrived, I was instantly happy. They are high quality and won't give me splinters. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Nice shape
customer_reviews.text: Nice little spoons with a good shape. Not super smooth, so they do absorb liquids easily and that will affect durability, but not too much of an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Wooden Spoon Set, 3-Piece,Brown
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Spoons| Design:Spoon SetGet back to your roots with the oxo good grips wooden tools. Made of solid, one-piece beech wood, these sturdy wooden tools are comfortable, durable and versatile. The line includes large, medium and small spoons, slotted spoon, corner spoon, sauté paddle and turner. The broad, deep spoon heads are designed to scoop generous portions of your favorite sauces and foods. Their distinctive straight-sided shape allows better reach along the walls and into the corners of your cookware. Use the sauté paddle and turner to flip, stir, scrape and chop your food in your pan. A natural oil finish coats and protects the wood. Safe for non-stick cookware and comfortable to hold, the wooden tools are handy for a host of cooking tasks. Hand wash only

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Set includes: Wooden Large Spoon, Wooden Medium Spoon and Wooden Small Spoon
